recipesJson.name: Summer Breeze, baby please!
recipesJson.author: NOVITEC
recipesJson.description: A must mix tropical vape.  This flavor will  bring you straight to a tropical beach with white sand , crystal blue water and a warm  breeze blowing through your hair.  This was one of my first completed successful recipes and still my favorite one.  It's a ADV that you wont be able to get enough of.
